content:
I am trying to add user via api. The curl command example given in documentation says to use below syntax
image.png

But when i try to view the raw format the POST call still shows as GET
image.png

Because of this I always gets user list in response instead of user getting created.
Please help to let me know where I am going wrong?

It looks like the web tool you're using doesn't parse the command line flags correctly.

What we show in the documentation is meant to run from a command prompt.

Thanks @Alex Vandiver . I was able to execute it but to my surprise it throws me an error saying "User not authorized for this query". I am the organization admin, even though it does not allow me to create the user. Could you please help me out? I am using the self host environment
@Aniket Sinha - I think that you'll need to add the can_create_users permission to the admin account you're using. See the note in the main description of the endpoint for creating users.
Thanks @Lauryn Menard ! This really helped.
